attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that torturing someone is the wrong way and a bad way to treat a human being. So join with me and abolish torture.

Why torture someone just because you haven’t got what you hoped for or what you want. That just makes you a greedy monster. Act like mature people and abolish torture worldwide. I’m part of it and I will go as far as I can to abolish it. 
Lets get everybody to act like humans and be friends together. Please think. Would you like to be tortured for a very long time? NO. Help us to do what you can.

rejection.details: Torture is already prohibited by international law.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
